title: In case of educational Institutional buildings Sr
clause_text: In case of educational Institutional buildings Sr. No 2 of Table 21, school bus parking (3.75 m x7.5 m each) at the rate of 1 bus for 40 Number of students for 50% strength of students may be provided at the option of owner/ developer.
